reviews.review: good game

all memes aside, this game does not live up to portal 1.

in portal 1 when i got stuck i sweated it out till i work it out and i was happy to do so, the design was the tightest ive ever seen.

portal 2 has the problem that its been over developed, the first one was a very minimal design with no space wasted. this one has too much and especially in the later levels it has the issue of having to really look for a portal surface which took away from the momentum.

7/10 i finished it and its competent, its only crime is having an outstanding lineage.

A MUST play if you enjoy Valve games. Fun co-op and a brilliant story.

This was a really interesting game much similar to the first one. The story mode seemed to drone on for what felt like an eternity but the ending was well worth it. The puzzles were just as hard if not harder than Portal 1, and we finally get some closure at the end of the game. Will always recommend this game series! Cake is still a lie!
ДЕВОЧКИ ЭТА ОТВАЛ ПИЗДЫ, классная игра
Interessant

Приятная графика, музыка также афигенна, новые головоломки, интересный сюжет. Кооп режим просто афигенен. У этой игры много возможностей. Просто уникальный геймплей, такого вы нигде возможно не увидете. Эта игра стоит чтобы ее пройти, а потом пройти с другом.
Se te pasan las horas volando mas los chistes y comentarios sarcásticos se hace muy divertido, lo recomiendo al 100%
Absolutely Incredible, this game looks great, and it's an incredibly fun time! It's surprising this released 9 years ago.

La verdad es que es un muy buen juego, ademas de tener una exelente historia, tambien tiene el cooperativo que es muy divertido. Pero lejos lo mejor son los mapas de la comunidad, porque añade un extra de dificultad que el modo historia le falta. Definitivamente lo recomiendo.

Portal永远的神
     一款9年前的游戏，没有花哨的特效，精彩的打斗。依旧让人惊艳。宏大的地底世界，巧妙的解密，一个个关卡看起来毫无关系的道具，在一扇黄门和一扇蓝门之间相互关联，一环扣一环。每次过关就觉得，好tm天才啊 这个关卡设计的。最后与G姐道别，乘坐电梯时炮塔机器人为你奏响的交响乐，真的惊艳。最后回到地面上，开门是一片一望无际的麦田，与在地底200层时的压抑有着鲜明对比。
      什么时候G胖才能学好数学，出portal大于2小于4.
amazing game definitly one of my favorites
非常有创意的游戏。刚开始我压根没懂规则，所以让他落灰了一会儿。但是明白规则和窍门以后，就开始好玩起来了。顺带还能练练听力
клас!

Portal 2 will forever be a classic, along with the first game. They’re just games that everyone knows! There isn’t much tk say besides the fact that Portal 2 is an excellent game, with an amazing story, added to a challenge in every stage. This game takes twists and turns that you won’t expect, so get ready.

Que jogo bom! Uma história muito interessante e divertida, o gameplay, assim como no primeiro jogo, permanece excelente, uma ótima trilha sonora e "dublagem" e gráficos que mesmo para um jogo de 2011, até hoje são bonitos, além disso, o mais importante é que os puzzles do jogo são realmente sensacionais.

Recomendo muito a compra de Portal 2

Even though this game is almost 10 years old, it still holds up very well. The gameplay is fun, the graphics looks nice because of the stylistic choices the developers made and the jokes are still as funny as when I heard them first when the game came out. An absolute classic. If you haven't played it yet, please do!

bonne suite de Portal, continue dans la voie des puzzles 3D avec une narration pleine d'humour. En plus la patte graphique est distincte et immersif, et le jeu tourne parfaitement sur mon PC vieillissant.

I like the puzzles and the concept of physics mixed with the idea of a teleportation device like the portal gun. Plus the humor is pretty funny. J.K. Simmons's voice plays a character in the game which is another plus.
